page.title: 15Wards Mobility Services
page.content: Wards Mobility is a very busy place. Part of it uses the buildings of an {old brewery.} They used to build a standard{invalid tricycle}which the government provided free for handi- capped people. Now the factory makes {all kinds of machines}to help those with disabilities to lead a normal life. While they last old tricycles are still repaired. Now the factory converts normal cars for use by the disabled, but the{disadvantage}of this is that the government will not pay to maintain them after four years. They make special{toilets, baths}and individually-designed appliances to help people move about the house, cook and look after themselves without human help. Engineers go all over the{South-East to{measure and design and service}the machines that are then made here.
